section.heading: Records and inventories of registrants.
section.text: Persons registered to manufacture, distribute, or dispense controlled substances under this chapter shall keep records and maintain inventories in conformance with the record-keeping and inventory requirements of federal law, laws of the District of Columbia, and with any additional rules which the Mayor issues.

annotations.annotation: Aug. 5, 1981, D.C. Law 4-29, title III, § 306, 28 DCR 3081
